data.eml:eml: The bamboo mealybugs Balanococcus kwoni n. sp. and Palmicultor lumpurensis (Takahashi) (Hemiptera, Pseudococcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pellizzari, Giuseppina, Danzig, Evelyna (2007): The bamboo mealybugs Balanococcus kwoni n. sp. and Palmicultor lumpurensis (Takahashi) (Hemiptera, Pseudococcidae). Zootaxa 1583: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178401
